Math Tutoring Services

Comprehensive mathematics support tailored to your learning needs and academic goals.

Primary School Mathematics

Foundation mathematics for students in Years 1-6, focusing on number sense, basic operations, and problem-solving skills.

  • Basic arithmetic and number operations
  • Fractions, decimals, and percentages
  • Geometry and measurement
  • Word problems and logical reasoning
From $60/hour

High School Mathematics

Comprehensive support for Years 7-12, covering all Australian curriculum mathematics subjects.

  • Year 7-10 General Mathematics
  • Year 11-12 Mathematics Methods
  • Year 11-12 Mathematics Specialist
  • ATAR preparation and exam strategies
From $70/hour

University Mathematics

Advanced mathematics support for university students studying mathematics, engineering, science, or related fields.

  • Calculus (single and multivariable)
  • Linear algebra and matrices
  • Statistics and probability
  • Differential equations
From $80/hour

Online Tutoring

Flexible online tutoring sessions using interactive whiteboards and screen sharing technology.

  • One-on-one online sessions
  • Interactive digital whiteboard
  • Screen sharing and file sharing
  • Flexible scheduling across time zones
From $65/hour

Group Sessions

Small group tutoring sessions for collaborative learning and peer support.

  • Small groups (2-4 students)
  • Collaborative problem-solving
  • Peer learning opportunities
  • Reduced cost per student
From $40/hour per student

Intensive Exam Preparation

Focused preparation for major exams including NAPLAN, ATAR, and university entrance exams.

  • Exam strategy and time management
  • Practice exam sessions
  • Weakness identification and improvement
  • Stress management techniques
From $90/hour

Tutoring Formats

Choose the format that works best for your learning style and schedule.

In-Person Tutoring

Face-to-face sessions at our tutoring center or your home (subject to location).

Online Tutoring

Interactive online sessions using professional tutoring software and digital tools.

Hybrid Approach

Combination of in-person and online sessions for maximum flexibility.

How to Get Started

Getting started with our tutoring services is simple and straightforward.

1

Initial Consultation

Free 30-minute consultation to assess your needs and learning goals.

2

Customized Plan

We create a personalized learning plan based on your specific requirements.

3

Begin Tutoring

Start your first session with a qualified tutor who matches your learning style.

4

Track Progress

Regular progress assessments and adjustments to ensure optimal learning outcomes.

Ready to Start Your Math Journey?

Contact us today to schedule your free consultation and take the first step toward mathematical success.
